page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 2 - RSA Chase Odds

The RSA Chase is always a fascinating race as it gives punters the chance to run the rule over future Gold Cup horses, the standard of this race continues to improve and it is fast becoming one of the highlights of the week. It is the perfect complement to the Champion Chase on Day 2 of the Festival and the 2015 race is already looking like living up to that billing.

RSA Chase Result 2015

14:05 RSA Chase (Grade 1 Novices' Chase)
1.Don Poli - W Mullins - B Cooper - 13/8F
2.Southfield Theatre - P Nicholls - S Twiston-Davies - 13/2
3.Wounded Warrior - N Meade - P Carberry - 12/1
9 Ran

RSA Chase Result 2014

14:05 RSA Chase (Novices' Grade 1)
1.O'Faolains Boy - R Curtis - B Geraghty - 12/1
2.Smad Place - A King - R Thornton - 13/2JF
3.Morning Assembly - P Fahy - D Russell - 9/1
15 Ran

RSA Chase Result 2013

2:40 RSA Chase (Grade 1) Cl1 3m110y
1. Lord Windermere - D N Russell - J H Culloty 8/1
2. Lyreen Legend - B J Cooper - D T Hughes 10/1
3. Hadrian's Approach - B J Geraghty - N J Henderson 7/1
11 Ran

2012 Result

14:40 RSA Chase (Grade 1) (Class 1, 3m 110y)
1. Bobs Worth (B J Geraghty) 9/2
2. First Lieutenant (D N Russell) 9/2
3. Call The Police (P Townend) 20/1
9 Ran
